statement.p: Out of the last 49 days, it rained 19 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{19}}{{49}}={0.38775510204082}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.38775510204082}={38.775510204082} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 38.78 .
